name: Cursor is Alive
description:
Cursor is Alive - Project made within the scope of Ludus Academie Entry Game Jam [2022 - 2023]

WARNING : A large amount of color can and will be displayed at the same time on the screen

Move your cursor to avoid multiple obstacles ! Beams, rotational beams, enemies, and more.

Score the highest you can by surviving as many stages as possible !

Unlock crazy perks

Playable with : Mouse and Controller

NetFoley : Game Design, Developer

Weact : Game Design, Developer

Music REDLIGHT - 9TS BABY (DISRUPTA BOOTLEG) free download on soundcloud by Disrupta
